form.name: form1

div.span: Important School Closure Information: Updated 4/16/2020 at 3:45 pm

span.strong: All Pennsbury School Buildings will be ClosedThrough the Remainder of the 2019-2020 Academic Year.

a.span: Please click here or on the corresponding link in the District News section

div.span: for information and updates regarding the school closure situation.

div.div: A National School District of Character

img.data-caption: The Pennsbury Instrumental Music Virtual Ensemble performs the Pennsbury Alma Mater here:
img.alt: The Pennsbury Instrumental Music Virtual Ensemble performs the Pennsbury Alma Mater

img.data-caption: The Virtual Pennsbury Chamber Choir performs a moving rendition of Amazing Grace here:
img.alt: The Virtual Pennsbury Chamber Choir performs a moving rendition of Amazing Grace

img.data-caption: This talented Pennwood MS student is devoting time at home to create masks to donate to local hospitals.
img.alt: This talented Pennwood MS student is devoting time at home to create masks to donate to local hospitals.

img.data-caption: Fox29's Bob Kelly (right) stopped at Pennsbury High School for a live segment of "Bob on the Bandwagon" with the PHS Long Orange Line Marching Band!
img.alt: Fox29's Bob Kelly (right) stopped at Pennsbury High School for a live segment of "Bob on the Bandwagon" with the PHS Long Orange Line Marching Band!

img.data-caption: The Edgewood Elementary PTO shared surprise gifts, cards, and breakfast treats with their Pennsbury bus drivers to show gratitude for all they do throughout the school year.
img.alt: The Edgewood Elementary PTO shared surprise gifts, cards, and breakfast treats with their Pennsbury bus drivers to show gratitude for all they do all year long..

img.data-caption: PA Governor Tom Wolf (2nd from right) visited Pennsbury High School on Feb 26th to discuss his proposed Nellie Bly Scholarship Program, a historic $204M need-based scholarship fund. Students, parents, counselors, District and school administrators, and Board members attended, along with State Representatives Davis, Galloway, and Warren.
img.alt: PA Governor Tom Wolf (2nd from right) visited Pennsbury High School on Feb 26th to discuss his proposed Nellie Bly Scholarship Program, a historic $204M need-based scholarship fund.

img.data-caption: Pennwood Middle School thanks PA State Representative Perry Warren (3rd from left) for the new state flag!
img.alt: Pennwood Middle School thanks PA Representative Perry Warren for their new state flag!

img.data-caption: Congratulations to the 2020 PHS MiniTHON team of 70 captains and 173 overall participants, led by faculty advisor, Meaghan Cappelloni, for raising another record-breaking total to support the Four Diamonds Fund!
img.alt: Congratulations to the 2020 PHS MiniTHON team of 70 captains and 173 overall participants, led by faculty advisor, Meaghan Cappelloni, for raising another record-breaking total to support the Four Diamonds Fund!

img.data-caption: After a competitive tournament played during fifth grade recess, the Super Duper Bowl X championship team at Eleanor Roosevelt Elementary was the Miller Mean Machine!
img.alt: After a competitive tournament, the Super Duper Bowl X championship team at Eleanor Roosevelt Elementary was the Miller Mean Machine!

img.data-caption: More than 160 Pennsbury elementary students gathered for the 4th annual Day of Service in memory of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. Blankets, cards, activity and supply kits were among the items assembled as donations for community groups and hospitals.
img.alt: More than 160 Pennsbury elementary students gathered for the 4th annual Day of Service in memory of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. Blankets, cards, activity and supply kits were among the items assembled as donations for community groups.

img.data-caption: PHS Concert Choir took the stage at Carnegie Hall in NYC as one of 8 international choirs performing the North American premiere of "Miserere: Songs of Mercy and Redemption" by Sir Karl Jenkins, under the baton of Dr. Jonathan Griffiths.
img.alt: PHS Concert Choir took the stage at Carnegie Hall in NYC as one of 8 international choirs performing the North American premiere of "Miserere: Songs of Mercy and Redemption" by Sir Karl Jenkins, under the baton of Dr. Jonathan Griffiths.

img.data-caption: Big Brothers & Big Sisters of Pennsbury High School were honored by the Pennsbury School Board in January, which is National Mentoring Month.
img.alt: Big Brothers & Big Sisters of Pennsbury High School were honored by the Pennsbury School Board in January, which is National Mentoring Month.

img.data-caption: CONGRATULATIONS to Afton Elementary for being named a National Blue Ribbon School by the U.S. Department of Education! Principal Dr. Joseph Masgai (top) is pictured with the Afton staff.
img.alt: CONGRATULATIONS to Afton Elementary for being named a National Blue Ribbon School 2019-2020 by the U.S. Dept of Education!
Pennsbury's Bus Driver of the Year is Thomas McGoldrick!

br.span:
Recognizing our proud traditions and diverse community,
the Pennsbury School District prepares all students to become creative,
ethical, and critical thinkers for lifelong success in a global society.
